message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $10,500.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $10,500. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? I'm confident that's a fair price for the product.
